meanings.definition: Of great extent or size; immense.
meanings.sent1: The desert was the vastest place I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The ocean is the vastest body of water on Earth.
meanings.sent3: The vastest pizza I ever ordered barely fit through the door!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as vastest as the universe.
meanings.sent5: The vastest mountain peak reached up to touch the sky.

meanings.definition: Very great in number, quantity, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent1: The library had the vastest collection of books I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The sky was the vastest canvas, painted with stars.
meanings.sent3: The vastest amount of ice cream I ever ate made me feel like a penguin!
meanings.sent4: His knowledge on the subject was as vastest as an encyclopedia.
meanings.sent5: The vastest field of flowers stretched out as far as the eye could see.
